hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I craft exceptional digital experiences through clean code, thoughtful design, and cutting-edge technologies. Let's build something amazing together.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with a love for creating digital experiences
about.intro: Hi, I'm Ghassan Abu Khaled - A Full Stack Developer
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 2 years of experience building web applications. I specialize in React, Vue.js, Node.js, and modern web technologies to create seamless user experiences.
about.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while planning my next project.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with to bring ideas to life

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: A personal task management application for organizing and tracking tasks.
taskManager.longDescription: Built a task management system with task categorization and progress tracking. Features include task creation, editing, deletion, and status management with a clean user interface.

thesis.title: Distance Coloring of Sparse Graphs
thesis.description: Bachelor thesis on efficient implementation of algorithms for distance coloring of sparse graphs.
thesis.longDescription: Bachelor thesis at University of Wuppertal (11/2023) focusing on two algorithms: Greedy and DSatur, implemented in C and JavaScript. Optimized algorithm efficiency through appropriate data structures, achieving significant performance improvements.

lernplano.title: Lernplano Web Application
lernplano.description: An open-source web application for creating and exporting learning paths as PDFs.
lernplano.longDescription: Developed during an internship at University of Wuppertal (ZIM), this web application helps users create and export learning paths as PDFs. Built and maintained using Vue.js.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.description: A beautiful weather app with forecasts and location-based updates.
weather.longDescription: Created a responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions, 7-day forecasts, and interactive maps. Integrated with multiple weather APIs for accurate data.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A responsive portfolio website built with modern web technologies.
portfolio.longDescription: Designed and developed a portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features smooth animations, dark mode, and optimized performance.

isabel.title: Isabel Artist Portfolio
isabel.description: Educational demo project - fictional artist portfolio website.
isabel.longDescription: An educational demo project featuring a fictional artist portfolio with biography, artistic journey, and sample works. Built for learning purposes using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with responsive design.

breakfastAlley.title: Breakfast Alley
breakfastAlley.description: Educational demo project - fictional restaurant website.
breakfastAlley.longDescription: An educational demo project simulating a restaurant website for 'Breakfast Alley' with menu, reviews, and contact sections. Created for learning web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

leslieBoatwright.title: Leslie Boatwright Real Estate
leslieBoatwright.description: Educational demo project - fictional real estate agent website.
leslieBoatwright.longDescription: An educational demo project featuring a fictional real estate agent website with property listings, services, and contact information. Built for learning purposes using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

maxwell.title: Morgan Maxwell Portfolio
maxwell.description: Educational demo project - fictional graphic designer portfolio.
maxwell.longDescription: An educational demo project featuring a fictional graphic designer portfolio with projects, services, and testimonials. Created for learning web development with focus on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lalissa.title: Lalissa - Modern Social Chat Platform
lalissa.description: Real-time messaging application with video/audio calling capabilities.
lalissa.longDescription: A real-time messaging application built with Vue.js and TypeScript, featuring video/audio calling, draggable call windows, and responsive design. Includes user authentication, live chat with Socket.io, and a modern UI optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

metaFrontend.title: Meta Front-End Developer
metaFrontend.description: Comprehensive program covering React, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and modern front-end development practices. Gained expertise in building responsive web applications and user interfaces.

googleIT.title: Google IT Support
googleIT.description: Foundational IT support skills including troubleshooting, customer service, networking, operating systems, system administration, and security fundamentals.

pythonEverybody.title: Python for Everybody
pythonEverybody.description: Complete Python programming specialization covering data structures, web scraping, databases, and data visualization. Built strong foundation in Python programming.

amazonJuniorDev.title: Amazon Junior Software Developer Specialization
amazonJuniorDev.description: Comprehensive 7-course specialization covering software development fundamentals, Java programming, data structures, algorithms, database management, full stack development, and generative AI applications.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together to bring your ideas to life
contact.conversationText: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to say hi, I'd love to hear from you.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. I'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.
footer.builtWith: Built with React, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS
